attributes.action: Bring Capital Punishment back for rapists only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Before feminism came around, many women were victims of rape in their marriages. Now that women have a voice, and the right to say no, men are picking on the defenceless; young girls.
Raping a child is sick, and until Capital Punishment comes back, rape will be on going because the offenders no the only concequence is prison. This has made all women in fear of rape. It must stop!
